pages.text: Use blank Progrisekeys on this block to obtain ZAIA Japan's Progrisekeys$(br2)Drops:$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#freezing_bear_progrisekey)Freezing Bear Progrisekey$(/l) (8.9%)$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#sparking_giraffe_progrisekey)Sparking Giraffe Progrisekey$(/l) (8.9%)$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#amazing_hercules_progrisekey)Amazing Hercules Progrisekey$(/l) (8.9%)$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#exciting_stag_progrisekey)Exciting Stag Progrisekey$(/l) (8.9%)$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#gatling_hedgehog_progrisekey)Gatling Hedgehog Progrisekey$(/l) (8.9%)$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#trapping_spider_progrisekey)Trapping Spider Progrisekey$(/l) (8.9%)$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#assault_wolf_progrisekey)Assault Wolf Progrisekey$(/l) (3.6%)$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#punching_kong_progrisekey)Punching Kong Progrisekey$(/l) (8.9%)$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#lightning_hornet_progrisekey)Lightning Hornet Progrisekey$(/l) (8.9%)$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#sting_scorpion_progrisekey)Sting Scorpion Progrisekey$(/l) (17.9%)$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/progrisekeys#amazing_caucasus_progrisekey)Amazing Caucasus Progrisekey$(/l) (3.6%)$(li)$(l:zero_one/items/zetsumerisekeys#awaking_arsino_zetsumerisekey)Awaking Arsino Zetsumerisekey$(/l) (3.6%)
